Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::SetIncidentStateOnLink
Setting.Description: Set the incident state of a CI automatically when a Ticket is Linked to a CI.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::EventModulePost###042-ITSMConfigItemTicketStatusLink
Setting.Description: Event module to set configitem-status on ticket-configitem-link.

Setting.Name: Ticket::EventModulePost###042-ITSMConfigItemTicketStatusLink
Setting.Description: Event module to set configitem-status on ticket-configitem-link.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::LinkStatus::TicketTypes
Setting.Description: Defines which type of ticket can affect the status of a linked CI.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::LinkStatus::DeploymentStates
Setting.Description: Defines the relevant deployment states where linked tickets can affect the status of a CI.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::LinkStatus::IncidentStates
Setting.Description: Defines the order of incident states from high (e.g. cricital) to low (e.g. functional).

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::LinkStatus::LinkTypes
Setting.Description: Defines which type of link (named from the ticket perspective) can affect the status of a linked CI.

Setting.Name: Daemon::SchedulerCronTaskManager::Task###RotherOSSCMDBNotifications
Setting.Description: Creates Tickets for ConfigItems at specific time points.

Setting.Name: RotherOSSCMDBNotifications::Rules###001
Setting.Description: At a specific time point create a ticket for config items, if the configured requirements are met. The time point is determined by the value of the field configured under "TimeCIKey" of the ConfigItem, and modified by "TimeModifier". If the latter can be either just a number, or a sign (+/-), a number, and an unit (d/h/m): "7" is equivalent to "+7d". The DynamicField "Ticket->DynamicField" will be used to mark created tickets - it has to exist. The flags \<OTOBO_CONFIGITEM_X\> where X can be NAME, NUMBER and DATE, will be substituted with the respective values in "Ticket->Text".

Setting.Name: RotherOSSCMDBNotifications::Rules###002
Setting.Description: At a specific time point create a ticket for config items, if the configured requirements are met. Value.Item:
Hallo HRC Servicedesk
Eine Lizenz oder ein Zertifikat läuft bald ab:
CI Nummer : <OTOBO_LICENSE_NUMBER> Name : <OTOBO_LICENSE_NAME> Ablaufdatum : <OTOBO_LICENSE_EXPIRE>
Für die Erneuerung kann das verknüpfte Config Item angewählt werden.
Ihr OTRS Lizenz und Zertifikat Manager

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::CILicenseDefaultSettings
Setting.Description: With this option it´s possible to fill automaticly a CI field, depending on the count of linked CI´s. The setting CounterClassName include the name of the class and CounterFieldName is used to store the count of used licence.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::CILicenseLinkTypSettings
Setting.Description: With this option it´s possible to fill automaticly a CI field, depending on the count of linked CI´s with the existing type DependsOn.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::CILicenseDeploymentTypSettings
Setting.Description: With this option it´s possible to fill automaticly a CI field, depending on the count of linked CI´s.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::CILicenseLinkedClassRestrictions
Setting.Description: If this option is activated, linked items are only counted if they belong to one of the listed classes.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::EventModulePost###200-LinkCount
Setting.Description: Config item event module that count the licenses for OTOBOCILicenseCount feature.
